Settings.Title: Settings
Settings.BluetoothConnectionError: For firmware update, connect device first
Settings.BruAppWillDownload: Now we will download and install the latest firmware to your BRU Maker. Please make sure you are connected to the internet.

error.sendCommand: ❌ Something happened while sending the command. Please try again
error.connection: ❌ Something happened while connecting to the device. Please try again
error.disconnect: ❌ Something happened while disconnecting from the device. Please try again
error.read: ❌ Something happened while reading data from the device. Please try again
error.pleaseConnect: Please connect your BRU Maker first
error.noConnectedDevice: No device detected. Please connect and try again.

step1.text: This APP needs access to Bluetooth to be able search and communicate with your device.

step2.text: We need access to your phone's Bluetooth to be able search and communicate with your device.

step3.text: Bluetooth and Location permissions are required to find and control your BRU Maker even when the app is not in use. Without access, things may not work as expected.

step4.text: Please activate Bluetooth on your device. Got to 'MACHINE SETUP' then to 'BLUETOOTH' and turn it 'ON'

step6.text: Cool! We found your BRU Maker! Please activate pairing mode on your BRU Maker. Got to 'MACHINE SETUP' then to 'PAIR NEW DEVICE'. After this step you must see 'Waiting for connection' on BRU device display.

step7.text: Now we are trying to connect to your BRU Maker. Please wait a few seconds.

step8.text: Please check your BRU Maker. You need to activate pairing mode. Got to 'MACHINE SETUP' then to 'BLUETOOTH' and turn it 'ON'

step9.text: Your BRU Maker is successfully paired with your phone. Now you can use all features of the app :)

step10.header: We need to update your BRU Maker firmware!

Help.title: Help
Help.contactDesc: Please provide the issue details to our support tea. We will assist you as soon as possible.
Help.modalSuccess: The request has been sent. We will contact you as soon as possible.
Help.InstallFilter: How to install a water filter?
Help.ResetPin: Where can I find the reset pin?
Help.ResetPinAnswer: The reset pin is under the drip tray.
Help.TastesDifferent: What can I do if my tea tastes different?
Help.Contact: How can I contact customer service?
Help.EmailPlaceholder: Please enter your email, so we could answer you!
Help.FeatureTitle: Have feature idea? Write it here!

UpdateFirmware.PleaseDont: Please do not disconnect your BRU machine from power until the firmware updated.
UpdateFirmware.UpdateCompletedDesc: Update is complete. Please wait a few seconds for BRU to reboot.
UpdateFirmware.Error: Some error occured during firmware instalation please try again later
UpdateFirmware.Old: Setting you BRU machine language. Please wait.
UpdateFirmware.LanguageDone: Language set. Please wait a few seconds for BRU to restart

Unpair.After: After unpair device you should pair it again.
